Title: Penny and Dime
Writer: Stan Lee (based on the Marvel comics by), Bill Everett (based on the Marvel comics by), Drew Goddard (created by), John C. Kelley, Whit Anderson (executive story editor), Luke Kalteux (executive story editor), Sneha Koorse (executive story editor)
Actors: Charlie Cox, Deborah Ann Woll, Elden Henson, Jon Bernthal
Plot: Karen uncovers shocking facts about the Punisher, who finds himself hunted by a powerful force in Hell's Kitchen. Daredevil ponders his next moves.
